name: Megalohealth
description:
This was my first game I developed with a small group during a game jam for a Gaming Course at FIAP, a brazilian university. We had to create a a game with health as theme. My group used the Undertale battlesystem to teach about antibiotics, bacteria and virus. 

I was responsible for programming, game design and some interface and art features.

Megalohealth was created with Unity Engine. 

Language: Portuguese.
